attributes.action: Make teachers a priority for the vaccine and get children back to school
attributes.additional_details: Children and parents are at home struggling to juggle workand home schooling. Some children don’t have the equipment for homeschooling, it is so important for children to socialise with other children and learn in a different environment. Some children struggle mentally and being at school is a safe haven for them and an escape. School is so important and teachers are so important. Children need school and parents need time to work. Add teachers to the priority group for the vaccine
attributes.background: I would like the government to put school staff as a priority for the vaccine, help get children back to school quicker.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
